concept.title: AFMC PGI 5319.602-3 Resolving Differences Between the Agency and the Small Business Administration

li.p: (a)(3)(A) If the contracting officer believes the agency should appeal a Certificate of Competency, the contracting officer coordinates with the local Small Business office and forward the appeal file through the SCO to SAF/SB with a courtesy copy to the MAJCOM small business office.
